entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
